descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Welcome to Pipe Craft, an enchanting mixed-reality puzzle experience that invites you to master the art of pipe arrangement. Dive into relaxation as you connect various pipe shapes and sizes, transforming them into intricate and visually stunning designs.

[media]

Explore an extensive range of levels, each presenting unique challenges, allowing you to solve puzzles at your own pace. The calming ambient soundtrack fosters a tranquil environment, enabling you to concentrate and savor the rewarding journey of puzzle-solving.

[media]

**Features:**
- 300 thoughtfully crafted puzzles
- Mixed Reality support
- Hand tracking compatibility
